channel.title: JBoss Issue Tracker
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ENTESB-4469] NullPointerException during patch:install
item.description:
1. unzip fuse 6.2 GA
2. unzip new patch management 078 to $FUSE_HOME
3. start bin/fuse
4. install bundle that doesn't resolve 100% correctly

JBossFuse:karaf@root> osgi:install -s mvn:org.python/jython/2.7.0
 
RROR: Bundle org.apache.camel.camel-script [231] EventDispatcher: Error during dispatch. (java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: javax/script/ScriptEngineFactory)
 
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: javax/script/ScriptEngineFactory
 
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
 
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:760)
 
        at org.apache.felix.framework.BundleWiringImpl$BundleClassLoader.findClass(BundleWiringImpl.java:2318)
 
 
 
 
 
JBossFuse:karaf@root> osgi:list -l
 
...
 
[ 265] [Active     ] [            ] [       ] [   80] mvn:org.python/jython/2.7.0
 
....

5. install new patching mechanism and patch

JBossFuse:karaf@root> features:removeurl --uninstall-all mvn:io.fabric8.patch/patch-features/1.2.0.redhat-133/xml/features  
ERROR: Bundle org.apache.camel.camel-script [231] EventDispatcher: Error during dispatch. (java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: javax/script/ScriptEngineFactory)
 
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: javax/script/ScriptEngineFactory
 
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
 
        at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(ClassLoader.java:760)
 
        at org.apache.felix.framework.BundleWiringImpl$BundleClassLoader.findClass(BundleWiringImpl.java:2318)
 
...
 
 
 
JBossFuse:karaf@root> features:addurl mvn:io.fabric8.patch/patch-features/1.2.0.redhat-621078/xml/features  
 
 
JBossFuse:karaf@root> features:install patch
 
 
 
JBossFuse:karaf@root> patch:add file:/home/jludvice/apps/fuse/jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-078.zip
 
[name]                           [installed] [description]                   
jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-078 false       jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-078
 
 
 
JBossFuse:karaf@root> patch:install jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-078 
java.lang.NullPointerException
 
        at java.util.regex.Matcher.getTextLength(Matcher.java:1283)
 
        at java.util.regex.Matcher.reset(Matcher.java:309)
 
        at java.util.regex.Matcher.<init>(Matcher.java:229)
 
        at java.util.regex.Pattern.matcher(Pattern.java:1093)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.management.Utils.stripSymbolicName(Utils.java:434)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.impl.OSGiPatchHelper.getCoreBundles(OSGiPatchHelper.java:73)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.impl.ServiceImpl.install(ServiceImpl.java:393)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.impl.ServiceImpl.install(ServiceImpl.java:344)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.commands.InstallAction.doExecute(InstallAction.java:63)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.commands.PatchActionSupport.doExecute(PatchActionSupport.java:41)
 
        at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.AbstractAction.execute(AbstractAction.java:33)
 
        at org.apache.felix.gogo.commands.basic.AbstractCommand.execute(AbstractCommand.java:35)
 
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
 
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
 
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
 
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:497)
 
        at org.apache.aries.proxy.impl.ProxyHandler$1.invoke(ProxyHandler.java:54)
 
        at org.apache.aries.proxy.impl.ProxyHandler.invoke(ProxyHandler.java:119)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.commands.$Install274817420.execute(Unknown Source)
 
        at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.CommandProxy.execute(CommandProxy.java:78)
 
        at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Closure.executeCmd(Closure.java:477)
 
        at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Closure.executeStatement(Closure.java:403)
 
        at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Pipe.run(Pipe.java:108)
 
        at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Closure.execute(Closure.java:183)
 
        at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Closure.execute(Closure.java:120)
 
        at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.CommandSessionImpl.execute(CommandSessionImpl.java:92)
 
        at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.jline.Console.run(Console.java:195)
 
        at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.jline.DelayedStarted.run(DelayedStarted.java:79)
 
Error executing command: io.fabric8.patch.management.PatchException

6. see NullPointerException in karaf shell and logs

2015-11-20 11:15:40,516 | ERROR | l Console Thread | Console                          | ?                                   ? | 34 - org.apache.karaf.shell.console - 2.4.0.redhat-620133 | Exception caught while executing command                                                                                                                                                                                                      
io.fabric8.patch.management.PatchException
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.impl.ServiceImpl.install(ServiceImpl.java:562)

        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)[:1.8.0_65]
 
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:497)[:1.8.0_65]
 
        at org.apache.aries.proxy.impl.ProxyHandler$1.invoke(ProxyHandler.java:54)[18:org.apache.aries.proxy.impl:1.0.4]
 
        at org.apache.aries.proxy.impl.ProxyHandler.invoke(ProxyHandler.java:119)[18:org.apache.aries.proxy.impl:1.0.4]
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.commands.$Install274817420.execute(Unknown Source)[268:io.fabric8.patch.patch-commands:1.2.0.redhat-621078]
 
        at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.CommandProxy.execute(CommandProxy.java:78)[34:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.4.0.redhat-620133]

        at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Pipe.run(Pipe.java:108)[34:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.4.0.redhat-620133]
 
        at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Closure.execute(Closure.java:183)[34:org.apache.karaf.shell.console:2.4.0.redhat-620133]

Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
 
        at java.util.regex.Matcher.getTextLength(Matcher.java:1283)[:1.8.0_65]
 
        at java.util.regex.Matcher.reset(Matcher.java:309)[:1.8.0_65]
 
        at java.util.regex.Matcher.<init>(Matcher.java:229)[:1.8.0_65]

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
One more NPE (fixed too):

java.lang.NullPointerException
 
	at io.fabric8.patch.impl.FabricPatchServiceImpl.install(FabricPatchServiceImpl.java:141)
 
	at io.fabric8.patch.commands.FabricInstallAction.doExecute(FabricInstallAction.java:78)
 
	at io.fabric8.patch.commands.PatchActionSupport.doExecute(PatchActionSupport.java:41)
 
...

Checked again with patch-features build 084:

JBossFuse:karaf@root> features:addurl mvn:io.fabric8.patch/patch-features/1.2.0.redhat-621084/xml/features  
 
 
JBossFuse:karaf@root> features:install patch
 
 
 
JBossFuse:karaf@root> patch:add file:/home/jludvice/apps/fuse/jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-084.zip
 
[name]                           [installed] [description]                   
jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-084 false       jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-084
 
 
 
JBossFuse:karaf@root> patch:install jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-084 
java.lang.NullPointerException
 
        at java.util.regex.Matcher.getTextLength(Matcher.java:1283)
 
        at java.util.regex.Matcher.reset(Matcher.java:309)
 
        at java.util.regex.Matcher.<init>(Matcher.java:229)
 
        at java.util.regex.Pattern.matcher(Pattern.java:1093)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.management.Utils.stripSymbolicName(Utils.java:434)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.impl.ServiceImpl.bundleUpdatesInPatch(ServiceImpl.java:632)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.impl.ServiceImpl.install(ServiceImpl.java:409)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.impl.ServiceImpl.install(ServiceImpl.java:344)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.commands.InstallAction.doExecute(InstallAction.java:63)
 
        at io.fabric8.patch.commands.PatchActionSupport.doExecute(PatchActionSupport.java:41)
 
...
 
...
 
Error executing command: io.fabric8.patch.management.PatchException
 
 
 
JBossFuse:karaf@root> patch:list
 
[name]                           [installed] [description]
 
jboss-fuse-full-6.2.1.redhat-084 false

Reopening for better handling of problematic bundles during patch:install.

For instance with this installed before patching

JBossFuse:karaf@root> osgi:install -s mvn:org.python/jython/2.7.0

This particular org.python/jython problem is special:

[ 265] [Active     ] [            ] [       ] [   80] <no symbolic name>

We don't have symbolic name, but bundle is Active...

Hi Grzegorz Grzybek,

I tried again with jboss fuse 6.3 build 026 (patch build 026 to build 025 to be more precise)
Steps:

  • start fuse 6.3 build 026
  • patch:add file:/..../jboss-fuse-full-6.3.0.redhat-025.zip
  • osgi:install -s mvn:org.python/jython/2.7.0
  • patch:install jboss-fuse-full-6.3.0.redhat-025
  • it ends up with: 

    stax2-api                                                        3.1.4                                       mvn:org.codehaus.woodstox/stax2-api/3.1.4                                                   
    woodstox-core-asl                                                4.4.1                                       mvn:org.codehaus.woodstox/woodstox-core-asl/4.4.1                                           
    java.lang.NullPointerException
    		 
            at java.util.regex.Matcher.getTextLength(Matcher.java:1283)
    		 
            at java.util.regex.Matcher.reset(Matcher.java:309)
    		 
            at java.util.regex.Matcher.<init>(Matcher.java:229)
    		 
            at java.util.regex.Pattern.matcher(Pattern.java:1093)
    		 
            at io.fabric8.patch.management.Utils.stripSymbolicName(Utils.java:434)
    		 
            at io.fabric8.patch.management.impl.FileBackupService.backupDataFiles(FileBackupService.java:70)
    		 
            at io.fabric8.patch.impl.ServiceImpl.install(ServiceImpl.java:499)
    		 
            at io.fabric8.patch.impl.ServiceImpl.install(ServiceImpl.java:360)
    		 
            at io.fabric8.patch.commands.InstallAction.doExecute(InstallAction.java:63)
    		 
            at io.fabric8.patch.commands.PatchActionSupport.doExecute(PatchActionSupport.java:39)
    		 
            at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.AbstractAction.execute(AbstractAction.java:33)
    		 
            at org.apache.felix.gogo.commands.basic.AbstractCommand.execute(AbstractCommand.java:35)
    		 
            at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
    		 
            at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
    		 
            at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
    		 
            at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498)
    		 
            at org.apache.aries.proxy.impl.ProxyHandler$1.invoke(ProxyHandler.java:54)
    		 
            at org.apache.aries.proxy.impl.ProxyHandler.invoke(ProxyHandler.java:119)
    		 
            at io.fabric8.patch.commands.$Install615280231.execute(Unknown Source)
    		 
            at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.CommandProxy.execute(CommandProxy.java:78)
    		 
            at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Closure.executeCmd(Closure.java:477)
    		 
            at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Closure.executeStatement(Closure.java:403)
    		 
            at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Pipe.run(Pipe.java:108)
    		 
            at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Closure.execute(Closure.java:183)
    		 
            at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.Closure.execute(Closure.java:120)
    		 
            at org.apache.felix.gogo.runtime.CommandSessionImpl.execute(CommandSessionImpl.java:92)
    		 
            at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.jline.Console.run(Console.java:197)
    		 
            at org.apache.karaf.shell.console.jline.DelayedStarted.run(DelayedStarted.java:79)
    		 
    Error executing command: io.fabric8.patch.management.PatchException
    		 
    JBossFuse:karaf@root> 
    JBossFuse:karaf@root> osgi:list -t 0 -l | grep patch
    		 
    [   1] [Active     ] [            ] [       ] [    2] mvn:io.fabric8.patch/patch-management/1.2.0.redhat-630026
    		 
    [ 186] [Active     ] [            ] [       ] [   80] mvn:io.fabric8.patch/patch-core/1.2.0.redhat-630026
    		 
    [ 187] [Active     ] [            ] [       ] [   80] mvn:io.fabric8.patch/patch-commands/1.2.0.redhat-630026

    Fix should be present inf fuse 6.3 build 026 right?

Tested with fuse 6.3 build 045

  • start fuse 6.3 #45
  • osgi:install -s mvn:org.python/jython/2.7.0
  • patch:add file:jboss-fuse-full-6.3.0.redhat-039.zip
  • patch:install #39

Patching works without issues, but after "patching" #45 -> #39 jython bundle is gone - not installed anymore.
Is this desired behavior Grzegorz Grzybek?

Josef Ludvicek I think so, as patch mechanism checks which bundles should be reinstalled after restart - the list is determined by checking symbolic names and I don't think this "bundle" has symbolic name:

Manifest-Version: 1.0
 
Ant-Version: Apache Ant 1.9.4
 
Created-By: 1.7.0_60-b19 (Oracle Corporation)
 
Main-Class: org.python.util.jython
 
Built-By: fwierzbicki
 
 
 
Name: Build-Info
 
version: 2.7.0
 
oracle: ${oracle.present}
 
informix: ${informix.present}
 
build-compiler: modern
 
jdk-target-version: 1.7
 
debug: true

Verified in fuse 6.3 build 45.
This would be "nice to have" ENTESB-5326 if it's reasonably easy to implement.
Closing issue.
